"use client" import React from "react" import { useState } from "react" import { Bell, Search } from "lucide-react" import { Button } from "./ui/Button" import { DropdownMenu } from "./ui/DropdownMenu" import { Input } from "./ui/Input" import { Avatar, AvatarImage, AvatarFallback } from "./ui/Avatar" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" import { ModeToggle } from "." export function Header() { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("") const { user, logout } = useAuth() return (
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} />

{user?.fullName}

{user?.email}

), onClick: () => {}, }, { type: "separator" }, { label: "Profile", onClick: () => { window.location.href = "/profile" } }, { label: "Settings", onClick: () => { window.location.href = "/settings"} }, { type: "separator" }, { label: "Logout", onClick: logout }, ]} >
) } function getInitials(name: string) { if (!name) return ""; const words = name.trim().split(" "); if (words.length === 1) return words[0][0].toUpperCase(); return (words[0][0] + words[1][0]).toUpperCase(); }
